snippet.title: Horizon Chase Turbo - Announcement Trailer - May 15th 2018 - Playstation 4 and Steam (WIN/LINUX/MAC)
snippet.description:
Playstation Store: https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/horizon-chase-turbo-ps4/
Steam Store: http://store.steampowered.com/app/389140/Horizon_Chase_Turbo
Site: http://horizonchaseturbo.com

Horizon Chase Turbo é um jogo inspirado pelos grandes sucessos das décadas de 80 e 90: Out Run, Lotus Turbo Challenge, Top Gear (SNES), Rush, entre outros. Em Horizon Chase Turbo, cada curva e cada volta recriam as partidas clássicas dos Arcades e proporcionam uma diversão sem limite de velocidade. Pise fundo no acelerador e curta o jogo!

MAIN FEATURES

-Thrilling arcade racing game, inspired by Outrun, Top Gear, Lotus Turbo Challenge, and others
-Modern high quality graphics and UI
-Amazing old-style split screen multiplayer up to 4 players
-Music by Barry Leitch, Sound Designer in 90s racing classics such as Top Gear and Lotus Turbo Challenge, among others
-Tons of content: 12 Cups, 48 Cities, 110 tracks, 26 Unlockable Cars and 10 Upgrades
-Challenge your friends in an Online Competitive Ghost Mode
-Make History by adding your name among Friends' Leaderboards
